title: Does Camping actually make your brain happier?
description:
Our friends at MEL Science are back with amazing monthly at-home science kits for YOU - a nd a special discount for our Smartypants. Use code SMARTY at MEL Science or just go to this link and get started doing science, every month, right at home!

Quickest way to hear YOUR name on Who Smarted? Leave us a great 5-star review on Apple podcasts, include your first name, and you might hear yours on an upcoming episode.

For free home science activities and helpful stuff for classrooms and homeschool sign-up for our free newsletter at www.WhoSmarted.com

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
